synopsis:
Based on the novel by Jack London.
Buck, a half German Shepard half Saint Bernard who's life is pretty peaceful and happy living with the Millersâ€™ in California. However, one day he is tricked and sold off. He ends up in the snowy North where he has become a sled dog during the Gold Rush. His story takes many twists and turns and he has to fight for his own survival.
(Source: ANN)

title.jp: Arano no Sakebi Koe: Hoero, Buck
